rooms.name: Bathroom
rooms.description: This is a blue bathroom. Yellowing toiletries surround the room and a toothbrush sticks out of an open drawer.

rooms.name: Bedroom
rooms.description: This is a large bedroom. An unmade bed and bedside occupies one corner and a closet and dirtly clothes occupy the other.

rooms.name: TopStair
rooms.description: This is the top of the stairs. Did you know that there are 12,000 accidental stairway deaths each year?

rooms.name: BottomStair
rooms.description: This is the bottom of the stairs, nothing to see here.

rooms.name: LivingRoom
rooms.description: This is a living room. A tv is mounted beside a book shelf and a couch lies in front of it.

rooms.name: Kitchen
rooms.description: This is a small kitchen. There are cuboards and a stove in front of you with a microwave, fridge and sink adjacent to it.

rooms.name: Garage
rooms.description: This is a garage. Your car is parked by the door. Shelves messy with miscellaneous items line the three other sides.

rooms.name: Kitchen
rooms.description: This is a kitchen. A fridge sits adjacent to a table and chairs. A microwave lies atop the counter and under the cuboards.

rooms.name: Reception
rooms.description: This is a reception. An empty desk contains a mess of stationaries that have been not been organized in a long time.

rooms.name: Top Office Stairs
rooms.description: This is the top of the stairs. Be careful not to fall down.

rooms.name: Bottom Office Stairs
rooms.description: This is the bottom of the stairs. Be careful not to fall up.

rooms.name: Basement
rooms.description: This is a basement. Boxes lie stacked in the corner, shadowed by the dark lighting.
